The label is read in parts: ***Cranberry Raisin ***Jete Nutritional Energy Bar***Contains Nuts***INGREDIENTS: Peanut Butter, Apple/Plum, Oats, Raisins, Cranberries, Brown Rice Flour, Coconut, Palm Sugar, Coconut, Corn Starch, Tapioca Flour, Almonds, Sunflower Seeds, Pecans, Flas Seeds, Egg Replacer, Sea Salt, Vanilla & Baking Soda  ***Contains almonds and coconut.  May contain nut shell fragments***".
